TopicTitle: Post Patch. Moving "Adjust Wing" Window - drops the window behind "Name Craft" bar = Can't move or close the "Adjust Wing" window.

Articles.Content:
Moved the pop up - and somehow when I let go of the mouse the top of the window fell behind the Name Craft bar.  This results in the inability to close or move the window.

Biggest problem is that ESC key does not work as a general 'close window' option.

This ultimately resulted in a freeze of the whole game.
